dataset_description: 9 orbiting scenes (5 outdoors and 4 indoors) each containing a complex central object or area and a detailed background. During capture authors attempted to prevent photometric variation by fixing camera exposure settings, minimizing lighting variation, and avoiding moving objects. Camera poses obtained with COLMAP. Image resolutions, following best practices, have been pre-downsampled 2x for indoor and 4x for outdoor scenes.
Outdoor captured scenes in realistic conditions. Following the 3DGS paper, we've selected only the tank and train scenes, but there are many more available.
Indoor captured scenes in realistic conditions. Following the 3DGS paper, we've selected only the playroom and drjohnson scenes, but there are many more available. Poses generated with COLMAP.

Large scale high-fidelity indoor captured scenes. 1000+ images per scene. We've selected the undistorted images for broader compatability, but the original images were captured with a fisheye lens. Due to the size, and following 3DGUT's lead, we've selected the 4x resolution images.
